def construct(self):
        mesh = get_plane_mesh(self.renderer.context)
        # mesh.attributes["in_vert"][:, 0]
        self.add(mesh)

        def update_mesh(mesh, dt):
            mesh.model_matrix = np.matmul(
                opengl.rotation_matrix(z=dt),
                mesh.model_matrix,
            )

        mesh.add_updater(update_mesh)

        self.interactive_embed()
